comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The 29th annual New York horse show was held at Madison Square Garden, starting on November 15, 1913. According to a NYT report, special reserved seating for orphans and other children was provided in the balcony, from which screams of excitement and glee rained down incessantly throughout the opening day performance:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4586896196/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- Your title above gives only a partial date. It should be as the Bain Agency wrote it in their caption, 11/15/13.
